getCustodial(uint256).details: This function ensures that the retrieved custodial address is active and authorized.

params.contentId: The ID of the content for which the custodial address is being requested.

returns._0: The address of the active custodial responsible for the specified content ID.

params.contentId: The ID of the content to assign.
params.distributor: The address of the distributor to assign the content to.
params.encryptedData: Additional encrypted data to share access between authorized parties.

getCustodial(uint256).notice: Retrieves the custodial address for a given content ID.

grantCustodial(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Assigns distribution rights over the content.
